author: bckfnn
msg: Calculate the margin offsets (border & padding), by increasing
current[IB]PPosition, in AbstractRenderer instead of in PDFRenderer.

author: jeremias
msg: Removed illegal tab characters. Please, guys, pay attention to your IDE settings! Checkstyle in Eclipse, for example, does a very good job of uncovering things like that.

author: bckfnn
msg: Simplify ET/BT handling by keeping track of the current state.
This change cause multiple calls to [begin|end]TextMode but only the
minimum number of ET/BT commands are written.

author: bckfnn
msg: Use the correct default (medium) for border-[top|bottom|left|right]-width.

author: bckfnn
msg: Removed hack that wrongly tried to calculate [start|end]-indent values.
